PETs Transaction Detection

utility.pets.coinjoin_find(wasabi_pattern, tx_input, tx_output)[source]

Profiling potential transactions involving coinjoin.

Parameters

  • wasabi_pattern – list of 5 patterns [criteria type (‘value’ or ‘proportion’), tx value, input, output, denomination output,change output].

  • tx_input – tx_input data.

  • tx_output – tx_output data.

Returns

Dataframe with transactions classified as mixer transactions.

utility.pets.coinjoin_scrape(wait_time=40)[source]

Scraping current unconfirmed Wasabi CoinJoin transaction hash from Wasabi CoinJoin API :param wait_time: random.randint() with second value such as 10,30 for between 10 to 30 seconds :return:

utility.pets.mixer_find(tx_input, tx_output) → pandas.core.frame.DataFrame[source]

Profiling potential transactions involving with mixer services.

Parameters

  • tx_input – tx_input data.

  • tx_output – tx_output data.

Returns

Dataframe with transactions classified as mixer transactions.
